CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The 'field.label' and 'field.headerTitle' inputs are directly used in the function without any sanitization or encoding. If these inputs contain malicious scripts, they will be executed in the context of the user's browser, leading to potential security risks such as session hijacking, identity theft, defacement of the website, etc.
